channel.title: How can I make it so only I can weild something?

item.title: How can I make it so only I can weild something?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

    if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BreeBree")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't breebree
    {
        sendMessage("You can't wield such power");
        PoisonPlayer();
        return false;
    }

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so only I can weild something?

item.title: How can I make it so only I can weild something?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

Here’s my code right now.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BreeBree")) // unequips weapon if your name isn't breebree { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield such power"); PoisonPlayer(); }

But if they wield it with a full inventory, they will be able to use it.
How do I make it so they can’t use it at all?
And is there a way to make armor have maxed stats so people hit only 0’s on me?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so only I can weild something?
